title: NIMHANS Recruitment 2026 - Walk-in-Interview for Senior Resident Posts
description: National Institute of Mental Health and Neurosciences (NIMHANS) has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for Senior Resident Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MD/ MS and DNB can grab this chance and apply for the NIMHANS Recruitment 2026 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can attend the walk-in at the address given below...
